'''Soul soil''' is a [[block]] found abundantly in [[soul sand valley]]s. It does not slow down [[entities]], but still activates [[Soul Speed]]. It can also be used to create [[soul fire]], and generate [[basalt]] when paired with [[blue ice]] and [[lava]]. 

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
The suitable tool to break soul soil is [[shovel]].
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Soul Soil|Shovel}}
Soul soil drops itself when it's destroyed.

=== Natural generation ===
Soul soil generates naturally in the [[soul sand valley]] biome.

{{Block distribution}}

=== Soul campfire ===
[[Soul campfire]]s drop soul soil when broken without [[Silk Touch]]. Because soul campfires can be crafted with [[soul sand]], which is a renewable resource, soul soil is thus renewable as well.<ref>{{bug|MC-178579||Soul campfires can be used to convert soul sand into soul soil|WAI}}</ref>

== Usage ==
Unlike soul sand, soul soil does not slow mobs down, does not create [[bubble column]]s in water, and is a full block in vertical size (meaning mobs or players do not sink inside of it).

=== Soul Speed ===
While wearing boots with the [[Soul Speed]] enchantment, players walk more quickly on soul soil.

=== Fire ===
Fire lit on soul soil becomes [[soul fire]].

=== Withers ===
{{FakeImage|align=right|{{BlockGrid|scale=2|w=Wither Skeleton Skull|s=Soul Soil|www|sss| s }}|The wither build configuration (with soul soil).}}
4 blocks of soul soil (or [[soul sand]]) are used in the construction of a [[wither]]. (See {{Slink|Wither|Spawning}})

=== Basalt ===
[[Lava]] on top of soul soil and directly adjacent to [[blue ice]] turns into [[basalt]]. (See [[Tutorial:Basalt farming]])
[[File:Basalt generator.gif|thumb|A simple basalt generator.]]
